snippet.title: Pokémon Academy Life Demo v1.0.3 Opening Sequence
snippet.description:
New update. New opening.

Character art: dmjh93
Direction: VisualJae
Music: "Pokémon Title Theme" - FamilyJules

LIKE our Facebook fan page: https://www.facebook.com/pkmnacademylife
Follow our Twitter page: https://www.twitter.com/pokemonvisual
Subscribe to the channel: https://youtube.com/pokemonvisual?sub_confirmation=1

Free fan made game for fans.

100% not intended for profit.

Join the conversation: http://pokemonacademylife.com/forum/
